entry.title: https://github.com/MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps
entry.content: This repository started out as a learning in public project for myself and has now become a structured learning map for many in the community. We have 3 years under our belt covering all things DevOps, including Principles, Processes, Tooling and Use Cases surrounding this vast topic.

entry.title: https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/azure-devops-docs
entry.content: This repo is the home of the official Azure DevOps documentation for Microsoft. GitHub Issues filed in this repository should be for problems with the documentation.

entry.title: https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh
entry.content: A pure Unix shell script implementing ACME client protocol

entry.title: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
entry.content: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

entry.title: https://github.com/yuaotian/go-cursor-help
entry.content: 解决Cursor在免费订阅期间出现以下提示的问题: You've reached your trial request limit. / Too many free trial accounts used on this machine. Please upgrade to pro. We have this limit in place to prevent abuse. Please let us know if you believe this is a mistake.
